name: no-more-jockeys
description: Multi-LLM No More Jockeys game implementation

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && (test -d venv || python3 -m venv venv) && (. venv/bin/activate && pip install -q -r requirements.txt && uvicorn api.main:app --reload --port 8000)
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && (test -d node_modules || npm install) && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend-prod: cd frontend && (test -d node_modules || npm install) && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://backend-pu7w8cumu-set4.vercel.app npm run dev
scripts.install:check: npm run install:backend:check && npm run install:frontend:check
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:backend:check: cd backend && (test -d venv || npm run install:backend)

author: No More Jockeys Team
